title: House for Rent in Gilroy
posting_body: The house for rent has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths.
There is also a living room and dining room.
There is AC and Heating for the entire house.
It is a very big house with lots of space inside the house and the patio.
The address for this house is 1855
Pacheco Pass Hwy, Gilroy, CA.
